tool.name: track_rt_raw
tool.description: Track the raw retention time in the peak slot of XCMSset objects.

param.name: xset
param.help: xcmsSet object saved as an RData file

param.name: extract_peaks
param.label: Save peaks to a tsv file

tool.help:
============================================================= Track raw retention time for XCMS set ============================================================= ----------- Description ----------- Tool to store the original raw peak information on the xset@peaks slot. Note: This can only be done BEFORE the retention alignment has been performed.
----------- Outputs -----------
* xset_with_rt_raw: xcmsSet object with raw retention of peaks saved on the xset@peaks slot
